tfg.System package

Submodules

tfg.System.main module

tfg.System.main.create_system()[source]
tfg.System.main.export_graph_png(output_path='langgraph_diagram.png')[source]

Generates a PNG diagram of the compiled LangGraph supervisor flow.

tfg.System.main.print_graph_ascii()[source]
tfg.System.main.print_graph_mermaid()[source]
tfg.System.main.run_conversation(user_input, return_full=False)[source]
Runs one turn of the supervisor flow, then prints:

  1. A full trace of every message exchanged

  2. The final_output field if present (otherwise, last assistant content)

✅ Modified: each run uses a fresh memory and new system
